class_notes:
Reading Homer Aloud in Greek, 1 credit course, S/U
The goal of this course is to teach students who have not previously studied Greek to read Homeric Greek aloud. We will begin by learning the Greek alphabet and basic pronunciation and progress to reading short passages. Translations of all selections will be provided. Students with some previous background in Greek may be able to join the class with the instructor's permission. Please contact her directly: lpratt@emory.edu.
course_description: Topic changes to meet current interest of students and faculty. Course may be repeated for credit as topic varies.
